title: Nuveen Credit Opportunities 2022 Target Term Fund (JCO) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Nuveen Credit Opportunities 2022 Target Term Fund ( JCO  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.047 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased JCO prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 10th quarter that JCO has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $9.81, the dividend yield is 5.75%.
The previous trading day's last sale of JCO was $9.81, representing a -1.8% decrease from the 52 week high of $9.99 and a 19.2% increase over the 52 week low of $8.23.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the JCO Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
